DOC.brief_title: A Randomized , Parallel-group Clinical Trial Hepatitis B Vaccine With Different Dosages Schedules Healthy Adults
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject age 16 25 establish medical history clinical examination Written inform consent obtain subject serum screen HBV marker Seronegative HBsAg , antiHBs antibody , antiHBc antibody Have never immunize HBV vaccine Subject medical history allergic ingredient vaccine Family history seizure progressive neurological disease Autoimmune disease immunodeficiency Women pregnant Bleeding disorder diagnose doctor Chronic disease : hepatitis , tumor , tuberculosis , et.al Any prior administration immunoglobulin blood product last 3 mon recruitment Subjects medical history serious adverse reaction vaccine
